metadata.name: MDMA.jpeg #1/12
metadata.description:
NFT Factory X Pierre Pauze

MDMA.jpeg Editions 12/12

15 Dec 2022 - 15 Jan 2023 Paris

√áa sent le crypto-sapin.

About the work:  
This is a representation of a sound wave emitted by a molecule of MDMA. 
WTF?  
 In 2018, I have to buy chemical substances  on the darknet with BTC for a project between science & Art, called Please Love Party.  
An  experiment about a "Love Drug Elixir" on human scale.  
After synthesizing in a laboratory  a powerful psychotropic drug made from chemical components and drugs, we transferred the essential information into water through a wave transmission device linked to controversial theories about water memory.  
It is a question, in a way, of digitizing molecular information, of creating a digital drug. 
The idea of introducing molecules in the digital sphere was like the last symbolic step of the all-digitalization. Biology being the last step from the the meta-perspective of the web3.  
This image is one of the digital traces of this experience.  
More info here : https://twitter.com/PauzePierre/status/1595133374397829122?s=20&t=CVILWqUuaY6bzPCnTs1sFA
